summary:
Podcasts are like radio shows, but you can listen to them anytime, anywhere on your phone or computer. They are digital audio (or sometimes video) files that you can download or stream online. People create podcasts about almost anything, from science to funny stories.

You can find them on apps like Spotify or Apple Podcasts. Many are free, but some creators ask for a small fee or have ads. There's a huge variety, with over 3 million podcasts available! You can learn, laugh, or just enjoy a good story on your daily commute or whenever you want.
title: Podcast
